post.author: 황성규
post.content:
Mr. Choi,Duksun sent me the following message.
------------------------------------------------ 안녕하세요.
Community One 의 멤버인데요, valued member로 부탁드릴려고 메일드립니다.
현제 Java developer 로 일하고 있고 보다 적극적으로 community one 참여하고자 합니다.
미리 감사드리며,
이름은 최덕선이고, id는 trabis로 쓰고 있습니다.
Just in case the Korean character can be broken, I am rewriting email in English again. Currently I am a member of Community One and I would like to be a valued
member to participate more actively in the community.
It will be greatly appreciated if you could accept.
Here my id is trabis just for reference.
Thanks.
post.title: A letter from a member
